short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin that visualizes the SDK API calls and Network calls

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Extension visualizes the API calls made to the Nielsen Browser SDK.
Purpose of this tool is to provide insights an information about what's going on in the SDK. It helps nailing down bugs and issues which may occur during integration.

As this is still in beta please send feedback about all the things which may not function or Feature requests.

Usage:
To position the window and remove overlays you can drag the window around on the website, and resize by pulling on the borders. The Extension will memorize the position and automatically display the inspector at this location going forward. The Memory is on a by domain basis. 

The Stream will autoscroll bottom if you scrolled bottom. To stop autoscrolling you simply scroll up a bit.
